targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  subgraphs.name,
  deployments.id as depoyment_id,
  sdas.node_id as node_assignment,
  deployments.entity_count,
  TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE 'epoch' + (subgraphs.created_at)::numeric * INTERVAL '1 second' as time
FROM subgraphs.subgraph_deployment deployments
JOIN subgraphs.subgraph_version subgraphversions
     ON subgraphversions.deployment=deployments.id
JOIN subgraphs.subgraph subgraphs
     ON subgraphs.id=subgraphversions.subgraph
JOIN subgraphs.subgraph_deployment_assignment sdas
     ON sdas.id=deployments.id
WHERE 
    sdas.node_id NOT LIKE '%community%' and 
    deployments.synced and
    deployments.failed and
    subgraphversions.id = subgraphs.current_version
ORDER BY subgraphs.created_at desc;

alert.message: Postgres connection errors have been observed.
alert.name: Postgres Connection Errors alert

panels.description: Count of the Postgres connection errors observed
panels.title: Postgres Connection Errors

alert.message: A synced subgraph on one of our "special indexing nodes" has failed.  ("special indexing node" = any index node without community in the name)
alert.name: Failed, Synced, Quarantined Subgraphs alert

panels.description: Filtered to only subgraphs that were deployed to current versions of subgraphs that are deployed to non-community nodes.

targets.rawSql:
select time, 'failed synced-subgraphs' as metric, sum(count) as value
from (
  select subgraphs.name, now() - interval '5 minutes' as time, 1 as count
    from subgraphs.subgraph_deployment as deployments
    join subgraphs.subgraph_version subgraphversions
         on subgraphversions.deployment=deployments.id
    join subgraphs.subgraph subgraphs
         on subgraphs.id=subgraphversions.subgraph
    join subgraphs.subgraph_deployment_assignment sdas
         on sdas.id=deployments.id
   where sdas.node_id NOT LIKE '%community%'
     and deployments.synced
     and deployments.failed
     and subgraphversions.id = subgraphs.current_version) failures
group by time, metric

panels.title: Synced, Quarantined Subgraph Failure

alert.message: One of the featured subgraphs failed!
alert.name: Featured Subgraphs' Errors

list.definition:
select deployments.id as "depoymentId"
  from subgraphs.subgraph_deployment as deployments
  join subgraphs.subgraph_version subgraphversions
       on subgraphversions.deployment=deployments.id
  join subgraphs.subgraph subgraphs
       on subgraphs.id=subgraphversions.subgraph
 where subgraphs.name in ('molochventures/moloch', 'ensdomains/ens', 'graphprotocol/compound-v2','graphprotocol/uniswap','livepeer/livepeer','graphprotocol/decentraland','melonproject/melon','betoken/betoken-v1','centrehq/usdc','zeframlou/pooled-cdai','daostack/alchemy','protofire/makerdao-governance')
 group by 1;
list.name: featured_subgraph_ids
list.query:
select deployments.id as "depoymentId"
  from subgraphs.subgraph_deployment as deployments
  join subgraphs.subgraph_version subgraphversions
       on subgraphversions.deployment=deployments.id
  join subgraphs.subgraph subgraphs
       on subgraphs.id=subgraphversions.subgraph
 where subgraphs.name in ('molochventures/moloch', 'ensdomains/ens', 'graphprotocol/compound-v2','graphprotocol/uniswap','livepeer/livepeer','graphprotocol/decentraland','melonproject/melon','betoken/betoken-v1','centrehq/usdc','zeframlou/pooled-cdai','daostack/alchemy','protofire/makerdao-governance')
 group by 1;
